How to play?

    PIG Dice is a game for 2 or more players.

  • Players take turns with a die.
  • On a player‚Äôs turn he/she can roll a die as many times as they like.
  • If a roll is a 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6, the player adds that many points to their score for the turn.
  • A player may choose to end their turn at any time and ‚Äúbank‚Äù their points.
  • If a player rolls a 1, they lose all their unbank points and their turn is over.
  • The first player to score 50 or more points wins
